attributes.action: Instead of taxpayer footing the bill,send these rioters to Africa or Asia.
attributes.additional_details: Courts are starting to process those arrested for the riots.But it will cost the country to put this troublemakers through the courts and into prisons.Instead of the taxpayer footing the bill,send these troublemakers to Africa or Asia for duration of their sentences,where they can be put to some good.Where they could help build homes,schools or dig wells and make a difference.It may even help them to see how good we have it in Great Britain and that they shouldn't abuse the system just because they can.
